channel.title: [Added] Update Humanitarian Scope Vocabulary 2-1 Humanitarian Plan URL
channel.description:
The URL on the [Humanitarian Scope Vocabulary](http://iatistandard.org/202/codelists/HumanitarianScopeVocabulary/) for '2-1 Humanitarian Plan' is currently show a 404 Page Not Found Error
OCHA have recently updated their web site and the required file is now available at http://ftsarchive.unocha.org/docs/IATICodelist_HS2-1.csv
The URL should therefore be updated to the new location of the file

item.title: [Added] Update Humanitarian Scope Vocabulary 2-1 Humanitarian Plan URL

item.title: [Added] Update Humanitarian Scope Vocabulary 2-1 Humanitarian Plan URL
item.dc:creator: hayfield
item.description:
This change to the codelist is now live: http://iatistandard.org/202/codelists/HumanitarianScopeVocabulary/

In light of this, I have updated the title of this post to [Added].

Read full topic
